actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To extend the King Range National Conservation Area boundary in the State of California to include the Mill Creek Forest.
short_title: King Range National Conservation Area Boundary Expansion Act of 2000

summary.text: King Range National Conservation Area Boundary Expansion Act of 2000 - Amends Federal law to add Mill Creek lands to the King Range National Conservation Area.

titles.title: King Range National Conservation Area Boundary Expansion Act of 2000
To extend the King Range National Conservation Area boundary in the State of California to include the Mill Creek Forest.
